sources.title: Madar - Mother (1989)
sources.description: Madar - Mother (1989) Synopsis The film progresses alonge two distinct but interwoven series of events. The first series involves young members of a family who have gathered round their old mother and revive their common childhood memories. The second line focusses on the old woman's preparations for her last journey and her joyous cooperation in arranging for the ceremonies that are to be observed after her death. Cast: Roghiyeh Chehrazad, Mohammad Ali Keshavarz, Farimah Farjami, Amin Tarokh, Akbar Abdi, Jamshid Hashempour, Hamid Jebeli, Mahbubeh Bayat, Akram Mohammadi, Hossein Kasbian
